faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a1: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and other payment methods through Paddle.
faq.q2: Can I switch between monthly and yearly plans?
faq.a2: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll be charged the prorated difference. When downgrading, the new plan will take effect at the next billing cycle.
faq.q3: Is there a free trial for premium features?
faq.a3: Yes! The free version includes all basic features. You can try the premium features for 14 days with our free trial.
faq.a4: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with the premium features, contact us for a full refund.
faq.q5: Do you offer discounts for students or non-profits?
faq.a5: Yes, we offer 50% discounts for students and registered non-profit organizations. Please contact us with proof of status.
